Module edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp
Package edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp.repository

Class AppointmentRepository

java.lang.Object
edu.wgu.qam2schedulingapp.repository.AppointmentRepository
public class AppointmentRepository extends Object
This is a singleton class that fetches and stores all appointment-related data from the database. The class provides methods to retrieve, add, update, and delete appointments.

The class utilizes the SqlHelper class to execute SQL queries and the Logs class to log events during its operations.

Author:
Parham Modirniya

    • checkTimeSlotAvailability

      public boolean checkTimeSlotAvailability(Date start, Date end, int id)
      Checks the availability of the specified time slot. The time slot is considered available if it does not overlap with any existing appointment (except for the appointment with the specified ID).
      Parameters:
      start - the start time of the time slot
      end - the end time of the time slot
      id - the ID of the appointment to ignore when checking availability
      Returns:
      true if the time slot is available, false otherwise

    • getAllTypes

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getAllTypes()
      Gets a list of all unique types of appointments in the list of all appointments.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList containing all unique types of appointments
